title: Staged Sync  err="[1/16 Headers] BuildMissedIndices: rlp: expected List"
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon version 2022.08.3-alpha-12331e01

OS & Version: Linux

#### Expected behaviour
Going to sync after downloading snapshots for BSC


#### Actual behaviour
Keep having error in a loop
EROR[08-31|10:26:00.407] Staged Sync                              err="[1/16 Headers] BuildMissedIndices: rlp: expected List"


#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
```
erigon --http --http.port 8745 --http.api eth,debug,net,txpool,web3,erigon --ws --datadir  /bsc_erigon/data --chain=bsc --networkid 56  --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:19090 --port 35555 --authrpc.port 8746
```

> @dandavid3000 try start with --downloader.verify

Thanks. It works !
